sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"开始"之意。
means: begin ： 最常用词，含义广泛，其反义词是end，多用于行动、工作等的开始。
start ： 在许多场合可与begin通用，但start侧重动作的起点。
commence ： 可与begin换用，但commence系书面正式用词，语气庄重，特指有正式程序或一定仪式，或某种正式行动的"开始"。
initiate ： 指创始或发起，侧重某过程的第一步，不考虑结束，强调起始。
inaugurate ： 指正式而隆重的开始。

sentence.Network_en: The meeting is scheduled to commence at noon.
We will commence with this work.
We commence building on March 18 th.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们于三月十八日开工.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 开字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 开设〖 establish〗 开始〖 begin;start;commence〗 开始〖 initialstage;beginning〗.
大学英语精读单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... springy a. 有弹性的 commence n. 开始， 着手 thermometer n. 温度计.
commander司令员（部），名commence开始，倡导，动commend表扬，推荐，动
张红岩TOEFL ... commander n. 司令官，指挥员 commence v. 开始，获得学位 commend vt. 赞扬.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French commencier, comencier, based on Latin com- (expressing intensive force) + initiare 'begin'

entry.def: When something commences or you commence it, it begins.

example.ex: The academic year commences at the beginning of October...

example.tran: 他们开始进行彻底搜查。

means.word_mean: 1. take the first step or steps in carrying out an action;

sentences.sentence: "Get working as soon as the sun rises!"
"The first tourists began to arrive in Cambodia"

means.word_mean: 2. set in motion, cause to start;

sentences.sentence: "The U.S. started a war in the Middle East"
"begin a new chapter in your life"
"I start my day with a good breakfast"
"The blood shed started when the partisans launched a surprise attack"

auth_sentence.content: That process of deciding penalties will commence after I meet Bryan.
auth_sentence.res_content: That process of deciding penalties will commence after I meet Bryan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That process of deciding penalties will commence after I meet Bryan.

auth_sentence.content: I like how you commence doing exactly that in your post.
auth_sentence.res_content: I like how you commence doing exactly that in your post.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I like how you commence doing exactly that in your post.

sentences.en: After the election the new government commenced developing the roads.
sentences.cn: 选举后新政府开始修建道路。

sentences.en: The little girl commenced to cry when she saw the snake.
sentences.cn: 这小女孩一看到蛇就开始哭了起来。

jushi.english: The second term commenced in March.
jushi.chinese: 第二学期自三月份开始。

jushi.english: The performance will commence from 7:00 p.m.

jushi.chinese: 法官们开始提出了诉讼。
